text: Colegio Marcelino Champagnat in La Pintana, Chile, opened in 1983, and since 1988 has been run by the Marist Brothers. It currently offers basic and professional technical education, and is subsidized by the state. ==History== Santa Rita de Casia Basic School opened in 1983. The Marist Brothers acquired the school and an adjacent lot in 1987, giving the school its present name. ==References== == External links == * Photos of school Category:Marist Brothers schools Category:Schools in Chile Category:Catholic schools in Chile Category:Educational institutions established in 1983
title: Colegio Marcelino Champagnat
